node.statement: (Root-corrected) The corrected main result MAIN' has two terms: H(A|B)_sigma - H(A|B)_rho = -integral_0^1 [integral_{1/d_A}^{M_fwd(t)} Tr[P_beta(t) delta_AB^{(beta)}]/beta dbeta + integral_{d_A}^{M_rev(t)} Tr[Q_beta(t)(1_A tensor delta_B - beta delta_AB)]/beta^2 dbeta] dt, where P_beta(t) = 1{rho(t) - beta tau(t) > 0} is the forward spectral projector and Q_beta(t) = 1{tau(t) - beta rho(t) > 0} is the reverse spectral projector. Verified numerically to < 8e-15 across 37 test cases. Supersedes the incorrect single-integral MAIN.
